adHeader: smart web design at very affordable price
adDetails: greetings! we are a NYC/PARIS based UX team that has worked with clients everywhere from SF to NYC to Montreal to Paris, and pretty much anywhere in between! and we'd love to work with you if you are any of the following - :: someone who knows what he/she wants :: someone who likes to work efficiently and effectively (mostly, being cost-effective is your goal in life!) :: and you are almost ready with your web site content (you have written at least a draft of what's gonna be on it...) then you might be the perfect client we are looking for! :: how we work we present you with a wide range of already made designs at a discount price - because we simplify the creative process so you do not have to wait long for your web site to be made - if you are ready with your content when we start working, you could have your web site up and running in a week! :: what you need to do {} find a design that appeals to you {} send us your content and site map for a quote {} make sure you have your domain and site hosting all set and ready to go {} we'll take care of the rest! visit our web site (http://partoutdesign.com/index.php?lang=en) and let us know if we could help by answering any questions - we love to hear from you! http://partoutdesign.com/index.php?lang=en cheers!
